welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Beachwood, where beautiful beaches and friendly locals await you. Indulge in our city's famous seafood and vibrant culture as you explore and discover all that Beachwood has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport provides services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves all airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Hopkins International Airport primarily serves domestic flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Hopkins International Airport serves both domestic and international flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
